text: been loving using this function by the way. Helps me keep those pesky marketers with their 300 dpi 1500px wide images in line when they ignore my pleas to use sane image sizes

Hi everyone, I'm working on a blog card for a thank you page and I'm having an issue where {{ content.post_list_content|safe }} and {{ content.post_summary }} aren't rendering a blog summary. I made sure "show summaries in listing page" was enabled in the blog settings. Anyone else run into this issue recently and/or recommend a solution? Thanks!
Is the template that you created a blog template or regular webpage template? I don't believe {{ content.post_summary}} will render on a non-blog template page.
That worked! Thank you very much, Reg!
